Title: Migrate & Modernize Your VMware Platform Using Azure VMware Solution Gen 2
EnhancedContent:
## Pre Requisites to Day 2 Operations and Azure Native Service Integration

This video series by Microsoft Global Blackbelts, Carlos Villuendas ([CarlosV​](javascript:void%280%29)) and Trevor Davis ([tredavis​](javascript:void%280%29)), guides users from configuring prerequisites to deploying, migrating on-premises VMware workloads to Azure VMware Solution, then integrating VMware workloads with Azure Native services for enhanced value.

These are the first two videos, much more to come, please check back often.

For requests, leave comments in the notes.

Enjoy!

1 - [Prerequisites](https://youtu.be/xQaA0NBX6eo)

2 - [Deployment](https://youtu.be/DHEmxR-PD2o)

Published Nov 06, 2025

Version 1.0
